introMain.titile: Create and share your photo stories.
introMain.text: Photosnap is a platform for photographers and visual storytellers. We make it easy to share photos, tell stories and connect with others.

introTwo.title: Beautiful stories every time
introTwo.text: We provide design templates to ensure your stories look terrific. Easily add photos, text, embed maps and media from other networks. Then share your story with everyone.
